tool_description: An API for collecting political articles for Biden and Trump
name: PAC API
title: PAC API

api_list.name: Get Trump articles from specific newspaper
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all articles for Trump from a specific newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pac-api.p.rapidapi.com/trump/boston_globe,new_york_times,cnn,washington_post,los_angeles_times,chicago_tribute"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pac-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pac-api.p.rapidapi.com/trump/{newspaper}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pac-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Biden Articles
api_list.description: This end point will return all articles from each major newspaper for Biden
